name: Jump Ship!
description:
The time to be a pirate is now! It is time to claim a ship and begin your journey to become the best pirate ever, even Blackbeard will shiver in his timbers!

In this Infinite "sailing" game, traverse through the open seas to fight off pirates, eat fruit and most importantly, find treasure! Can you traverse through these waters and find the treasure or will the Kraken swallow up another victim?
  • Get Coins to unlock better ships!
  • Avoid scurvy by grabbing citrus fruits for power-ups!
  • Use cannonballs to destroy the enemy, whether it be land or foe!

Most Importantly, Become the pirate to claim the seas!!
